description.b: So far we created a graph model. We now want to generate a test from this model.

item.title: Generating a test
item.description:
In the Package Explorer, right-click the src/main/resources folder and select GW4E -> Generate Test and Interface
A java editor is opened with the new created test SimpleImpl. As you might have expected a method has been generated for each graph elements (Vertices and Edges)

item.title: Running a test
item.description:
In the Package Explorer, right-click the src/main/java/com.company/SimpleImpl.java file and select Run As -> GW4E Test
You can see the result execution in the Eclipse output console. For the tutorial purpose, let's say that this is the state you want for your test and your are fine with it. So far, so good, your are happy with your test, but in the next steps, you will have a discussion with your test manager to extend it...
